allOf.description:
Allowed limit selected for the application. Used
in case the application has multiple allowed values calculated and
the requesting channel is selecting one

Maker.description:
User that initiated the approval action.
Defaulted to "cortex" in case not specified

Checker.description:
User that approved the action, defaulted to
"cortex" in case not specified

Notes.description:
Notes to be saved in the application history for
the approval

GenerateCard.description:
Specifies if a card should be generated and
linked to the application after the approval. Defaulted to false
in case not specified

CreditLimit.description:
Selected credit limit to set for the
application/card in case multiple ones are calculated for the
application

EvaluationCode.description: Evaluation code used to calculate this limit.

InstitutionCode.description:
Institution code the application
belongs to

allOf.description: Type of the application in case found.
Details of the application in case found
Current status of the application in case found

Only available in case the application is for a
corporate card and the corporate company is found and valid

Holds customer related details in case a customer
is created and exists for the application

List of credit accounts created by the approval
in case any
List of cards created by the approval in case any

AccountDetails.description:
Single account created by the application
approval if any

CardDetails.description:
Individual card details created by the
application if any

currId_CurrencyType.title: currId_CurrencyType

CurrCode.description: Numeric ISO code identifying the currency

AlphaCode.description: ISO Alpha Code identifying the currency

currId_CurrencyType.description:
Identifier for a currency. Can be either the ISO
numeric code or ISO Alpha Code

sch2_ActionCode.title: sch2_ActionCode
sch2_ActionCode.description:
Action code identifying the result of a
transaction.

sch2_YesNoFlag.title: sch2_YesNoFlag
sch2_YesNoFlag.description:
Flag indicating if a specific option is enabled or
disabled

sch2_Money.title: sch2_Money

allOf.description: Currency of the amount

sch2_Money.description:
Any amounts used in the webservices use the money
type which is the combination of the amount and currency. To get the
list of supported ISO currency codes, use the GetCurrencyList
service

sch2_CtxLocaleDescrList.title: sch2_CtxLocaleDescrList
sch2_CtxLocaleDescrList.description:
List of Locale descriptions defined cortex for a
specific element

sch2_CtxLocaleDescrType.title: sch2_CtxLocaleDescrType
sch2_CtxLocaleDescrType.description:
Locale description having the defined cortex
locale, description and short description

sch2_DescriptionList.title: sch2_DescriptionList
sch2_DescriptionList.description:
List of all description values available for a
specific entity

sch2_PageSetupType.title: sch2_PageSetupType

PageSize.description: Number of results supported in a single page

PageNumber.description:
The requested page number starting with 1 for the
first page. If not specified, it will be defaulted to 1

ReturnCount.description:
Specifies if the count and page details are
required in the response. If set to true, the PagingDetails tag
will be returned in the response holding the total number of
results, current number of results in the requested page, current
page number and total page number. If not specified, defaults to
true. This tag is introduced to enhance performance and response
time in case the total count is not really required

sch2_PageSetupType.description:
Page setup required (number of records per page and
the page number required)

sch2_PagingDetailsType.title: sch2_PagingDetailsType

PageSize.description:
Number of results supported in a single page.
Echoed back from the request

TotalNumberOfResults.description: Total number of results for the request

CurrentNumberOfResults.description:
Current of number of results returned in the
response

TotalNumberOfPages.description:
Total number of pages for the all results
satisfying the critieria of the request

CurrentPageNumber.description: Current page number for the results

sch2_PagingDetailsType.description: Details of the paging returned in the response

sch2_TransactionTypeListType.title: sch2_TransactionTypeListType

TransactionType.description:
Start tag for the list of individual denied
transaction types

sch2_TransactionTypeListType.description:
A list of services (transaction types) defined and
used in Cortex

sch2_BatchClassType.title: sch2_BatchClassType
sch2_BatchClassType.description:
Value indicating if a card batch is instant or
bulk...

sch2_AccountDerivationMethod.title: sch2_AccountDerivationMethod
sch2_AccountDerivationMethod.description:
Used for requests where the account is not
specified but the card is and the processing requires an account to
be selected. It defines how the account will be selected based on
the card specified

sch2_AmountRangeType.title: sch2_AmountRangeType

AmountFrom.description: Lower amount value for the range

AmountTo.description: Higher amount value for the range

sch2_AmountRangeType.description:
Range of amount (low/high) mainly used for inquiry
services. Both amount from and to can be specified or only one of
them.

sch2_CreditTransactionAction.title: sch2_CreditTransactionAction
sch2_CreditTransactionAction.description:
Action for a new credit transaction. Defaulted to C
- Create only if not specified

sch2_MessageClassType.title: sch2_MessageClassType
sch2_MessageClassType.description:
Identifies if the transaction is an authorization
transaction, financial, reversal..

sch2_DateRangeType.title: sch2_DateRangeType

DateFrom.description: From date value for the range

DateTo.description: to date value for the range

sch2_DateRangeType.description:
Range of dates mainly used for inquiry
services.
Both dates from and to can be specified or only one of
them.
(depending on the service)

sch2_TimeRangeType.title: sch2_TimeRangeType

TimeFrom.description: From Time value for the range

TimeTo.description: To Time value for the range

sch2_TimeRangeType.description:
Range of times mainly used for inquiry services.
Both time from and to can be specified or only one of them
(depending on the service)

sch2_CreditDebitType.title: sch2_CreditDebitType
sch2_CreditDebitType.description:
This flag indicates if the transaction is a
credit
or debit one. In some cases where the transaction is
suspended or not
yet posted, the value will be U - Undefined

DateLocalAsc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by local date ascending (oldest to newest). Should be skipped in
case date local desc
is specified

DateLocalDesc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by local date descending (newest to oldest). Should be skipped in
case date local asc
is specified

TimeLocalAsc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by local time ascending (oldest to newest). Should be skipped in
case time local desc
is specified

TimeLocalDesc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by local time descending (newest to oldest). Should be skipped in
case time local asc
is specified

PostingDateAsc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by posting date ascending (oldest to newest). Should be skipped in
case posting date desc
is specified

PostingDateDesc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by the posting date descending (newest to oldest). Should be
skipped in
case posting date asc is specified

TransactionAmountAsc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by the transaction amount ascending (smallest to largest). Should
be skipped in
case transaction amount desc
is specified

TransactionAmountDesc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by the transaction amount descending (largest to smallest). Should
be skipped in
case transaction amount asc
is specified

BillingAmountAsc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by the billing amount ascending (smallest to largest). Should
be
skipped in
case billing amount desc
is specified

BillingAmountDesc.description:
Specifies that the transactions should be ordered
by the billing amount descending (largest to smallest). Should
be
skipped in
case billing amount asc
is specified

sch2_PinTypeType.title: sch2_PinTypeType
sch2_PinTypeType.description:
Specifies the type of the pin. As multiple pins
are
supported by Cortex, this will identify the usage of the pin

Tag.description: Tag for the customer specific user data

User.description:
User name requesting the service. This will be
validated and if not configured or not allowed for this service,
the request will be rejected

Password.description:
Password of the user requesting the service. This
will be validated and if incorrect, the request will be rejected

allOf.description:
Specifies the version of the header used. Current
supported values are 1.0.0. Echoed back in the response header

MsgUid.description:
Unique message ID identifying a specific
message. Echoed back in the response header

Source.description:
Source of the request. Echoed back in the
response header

ServiceId.description:
Service Id of the service being called. Echoed
back in the response header.

ReqDateTime.description:
Request Date and Time echoed back in the
response
in the format yyyy-MM-dd-HH:mm:ss.SSS

Locale.description:
Locale required for the localized response
message. In case not specified, the localized response message
will not be returned in the response. In case specified but
invalid or no localized messages are setup for this locale
message, the default English message will be returned in the
localized response message

allOf.description:
Security holding the user and password of the
requester of the service. Only mandatory in case the security is
enabled for the services

Header user data for customer specific usage.
This field will be echoed back as is in the response if present,
mainly used for fields from the request that might be needed in
the response for the customer's internal usage. No validation is
done on these fields. In some rare cases, these can hold customer
specific tags

Specifies the version of the header used. Current
supported values are 1.0.0. Echoed back from the request header

MsgUid.description:
Unique message ID identifying a specific
message. Echoed back from the request header

Source.description:
Source of the request. Echoed back from the
request header

ServiceId.description:
Service Id of the service called. Echoed back
from the request header

ReqDateTime.description:
Request Date and Time echoed back from the
request

RspDateTime.description:
Response Date and Time in the format
yyyy-MM-dd-HH:mm:ss.SSS

ResponseCode.description:
Response code of the request processing. This
value is unique for each error. A response code of 000 indicates a
successful operation. Any other response code indicates an error.
The value 999 indicates an unknown system error

ResponseType.description:
Indicates the type of the response code.
Supported values are
- Validation Error: Returned when invalid
elements are received in the request
- Business Error: Indicates a
business logic error (i.e. request operation on a card that does
not exist)
- System Error: Indicates a system error (i.e. Database
Error)
- Success: Indicates a successful request

ProcessingTime.description:
Time taken by the web-service to do the
processing and reply in milli seconds

ResponseDescription.description:
Description of the request result and the
response code. Gives additional details about the result of the
operation

allOf.description:
Only returned when a locale is specified in the
request.

List of customer specific response description in
case configured

Header user data for customer specific usage.
This field will be echoed back as is in the response if present,
mainly used for fields from the request that might be needed in
the response for the customer's internal usage. No validation is
done on these fields. In some rare cases, these can hold customer
specific tags

Locale.description:
Locale echoed back from the request regardless if
it was valid or not

LocalizedDescription.description:
Localized description of the response. In case
the locale specified is invalid or the no localized messages are
defined for the locale specified, this will hold the same value as
the ResponseDescription

CustomerSpecificResponseDescription.description: Customer specific descriptions in case configured

Locale.description: Locale for the message returned under this tag

ResponseDescription.description:
Customer specific response description in the
locale specified under this tag

Pan.description:
Encrypted card number (can be either using cortex
encryption algorithm or an external encryption algorithm
implementation specific)

VPan.description:
Virtual card number generated by cortex for the
card in case configured so. In case configured, it will be
encrypted using an external encryption algorithm

CardStatus.description:
Status of the card. To get the list of
supported
values, use the GetCardStatusList service

OldPlasticExpiryDate.description:
Old plastic card expiry in case an old plastic
exists (in case of renewal)

OldPlasticCardStatus.description:
Old plastic card status in case an old plastic
exists (in case of renewal). To get the list of
supported values,
use the GetCardStatusList service

EmbossingName.description: Embossing name used for the card

Additional.description: Specifies if this is a primary or additional card

BatchNumber.description: Batch number the card is added to

Kinship.description:
Relationship to the primary card in case this is
an additional card

LastActivity.description:
Date and time of the last activity on the card in
case available

LastStatusChangeDate.description: Date the card status was changed last.

ActivationDate.description:
Date the card was activated. Only returned when
the extended card details are being returned and the card is
activated

DateLastIssued.description:
Date the card was last issued/printed. Only
returned when the extended card details are being returned and the
card was actually printed

UserData.description:
Customer specific data. Used for customer
specific purposes

UserData1.description:
Customer specific data 1. Used for customer
specific purposes

UserData2.description:
Customer specific data 2. Used for customer
specific purposes

UserData3.description:
Customer specific data 3. Used for customer
specific purposes

UserData4.description:
Customer specific data 4. Used for customer
specific purposes

UserData5.description:
Customer specific data 5. Used for customer
specific purposes

Memo.description:
Memo set for the card in case any. Only returned
if the extended card details are being returned

CustomerCode.description:
Unique code identifying a customer in cortex
under a specific institution. This field can be used to do
operations on a customer

IdNumber.description: Customer ID number in case available

ExternalCustomerCode.description:
External customer code (usually holding the
bank's CIF)

UserData1.description:
Customer user data 1 for customer specific
purposes

UserData2.description:
Customer user data 2 for customer specific
purposes

UserData3.description:
Customer user data 3 for customer specific
purposes

UserData4.description:
Customer user data 4 for customer specific
purposes

StatusCode.description:
Unique code identifying the application status.
To
get the list of supported values, use the
GetApplicationStatusList
service

Canceled.description:
Specifies the application having this status is
considered as canceled

TypeCode.description:
Unique code identifying the application type. To
get the list of supported values, use the GetApplicationTypeList
service

Additional.description:
Specifies if the application type is for
additional cards or primary ones

Corporate.description:
Specifies if the application type is for
corporate cards or individual ones

ApplicationNumber.description:
Application number generated or echoed back from
the request in case originally specified

ExternalApplicationNumber.description:
External application number echoed back from the
request in case sent, otherwise, the number generated by cortex

ApplicationStatus.description:
Current application status. To get the list of
applicable values, please use the GetApplicationStatusList
service.

Organization.description:
Organization the application belongs to.
These
values are bank specific. Cortex does not do any
validation on this
value. It is used for logging purposes and
might be used in bank
specific implementations

Product.description: Card product requested for the application

ApplicationSource.description:
Code identifying the source of the application.
To get the list of supported values, use the GetStringDescription
service with description type "aplsrc"

SalesSource.description:
Sales sources for the credit card/application.
This fields is used for customer specific purposes. Cortex does
not validate this field. It is used for logging purposes only

DeliveryMethod.description:
Delivery method for the card in case the
application is approved. To get the list of supported value, use
the GetStringDescription service with description type as "dlvmtd"

ProgramCode.description:
Program code for the credit card/application.
This fields is used for customer specific purposes. Cortex does
not validate this field. It is used for logging purposes only

Campaign.description:
Campaign for the credit card/application.
This
fields is used for customer specific purposes. Cortex does
not
validate this field. It is used for logging purposes only

Plastic.description:
Plastic to use for the credit card. This fields
is used for customer specific purposes. Cortex does not validate
this field. It is used for logging purposes only

Design.description:
Design to use for the credit card. This fields is
used for customer specific purposes. Cortex does not validate this
field. It is used for logging purposes only

ProcessStage.description:
Last processing stage of the application. To get
the list of supported process stages, use the
GetProcessControlList service with ReturnProcessStages set to true

allOf.description: Last processing stage status

Score.description:
Score calculated for the application in case
available (sent in the request or calculated by cortex)

ExternalScore.description:
External score received in the request or
calculated by an external system

RequestedLimit.description:
Credit limit requested by the customer in case
originally specified

SuggestedLimit.description:
Limit suggested by the bank for the customer in
case any

AssignedLimit.description:
Actual assigned limit for the card in case any
and the limit calculated by Cortex

allOf.description:
Allowed limit list of the application in case
multiple ones exist and the customer has the option to select one

EligibilityCheckResult.description:
Eligibility check result either sent in the
request or generated by cortex

EligibilityCheckDescription.description:
Description of the eligibility check result
either received in the request or generated by cortex

EmbossName.description:
Embossing name to use for the card in case the
application is approved and a card created

PlaceOfBirth.description: Customer place of birth in case available

LocalizedDateOfBirth.description:
Date of birth in alternative/localized date of
birth.

allOf.description: Customer Gender
Customer marital status.

Nationality.description:
Customer nationality in numeric ISO country code.
To get the list of supported ISO country codes, use the
GetCountryList service

IdType.description:
ID type presented by the customer. To
get the list
of supported values, use the GetStringDescription
service with
description type as "idtype"

EducationLevel.description:
Education level of the customer. The usage of
this field is customer specific. Cortex does not validate the
value of this field. It's saved for logging purposes and can be
used in the rule engine

ProfessionCode.description:
Profession code of the customer. To get the list
of supported
values for this field, use the GetNumericDescription
service with
description type as "pr"

NumberOfDependents.description: Number of dependents for the customer.

EmploymentYears.description: Number of years the customer has been employed.

EmploymentMonths.description: Number of months the customer has been employed.

EmploymentActivity.description:
Employment activity. This field is for customer
specific usage. Cortex does
not validate this field and it can be
used in the rule engine

CIF.description: Customer identifier in the bank in case available

BankAccountNumber.description: Bank account number used for auto-debit

allOf.description:
Currency Code of the account/card requested for
this application

List of requested currencies to be created for
the card. Only allowed in case the product supports
multi-currency. If not specified, depending on the configuration
of the product, either all currencies will be created or only the
default one for the account type

CreditAccountNumber.description:
Credit account number generated by cortex or
echoed back from the request in case received

AccountType.description:
Account type of the application being
created.
Depending on the implementation, the usage of this field might
vary. Please validate the usage with an FIS officer. In case the
field is used to refer to the credit account type, you can get the
list of allowed values using the GetAccountTypeList service

AverageBalance.description:
Average balance of the customer for a bank
specific period. It's up to the bank to determine the period used.

DepositAmount.description:
Deposit amount placed/reserved by the customer in
case any.

GuarenteeAccountNumber.description: Account number used for guarantee in case.

GuarenteeAmount.description: Amount specified by the customer as guarantee.

InstalmentAmount.description:
Installment amount specified by the customer.
Used for logging purposes only and can be used in the rule engine.

allOf.description:
Specifies if auto-debit should be applied for the
payments for the due amount.

PaymentMethod.description:
Specifies the payment method for the customer
(full or minimum due). To get the list of supported values, use
the GetNumericDescription service with description type as "paym"

BillingCycle.description:
Billing cycle to link the new credit account to.
To get the list of supported values, use the GetBillingCycleList
service

OldIssueDate.description: Old card issue date in case available.

OtherPaymentsDate.description:
Other payment date in case the customer has other
payments elsewhere.

MaximumDelinquency.description:
Maximum delinquency reported by the credit bureau
for the customer.

CreditBureauDecision.description:
Credit bureau decision indicating if the
application is approved or not by the credit bureau

CreditBureauUserData.description:
Customer specific data for the credit bureau
checks for customer specific usage

allOf.description: Specifies if the card can be used for e-commerce.

NumberOfCards.description: Number of cards the customer has in the bank.

OtherBank.description:
Specifies if the customer has cards in another
bank.

OtherBankDescription.description:
Description of the other bank the customer has
cards in.

OldCardNumber.description:
Old credit card number in case the customer
already had one.

InsuranceProduct.description:
Insurance product in case requested by the
customer.

SocialCode.description:
Social code categorizing the customer. To get the
list of supported values, use the GetStringDescription service
with description type "socio"

allOf.description:
Various flags used by the bank. Each flag
position has a purpose and is customer specific. To get the
description of the flags for a specific implementation, please
refer to an FIS officer

Various check flags used by the bank. Each check
flag position has a purpose and is customer specified. The value
of each flag can be either 1 or 0. example of usage: Customer
Verified. To get the description of the flags for a specific
implementation, please refer to an FIS officer

Maker.description: User that initiated the application creation.

Checker.description: User that approved the application creation.

ReferredTo.description:
Specifies if the application has been referred to
another department.

ReferralReason.description:
Reason the application was referred to another
department

UserData1.description:
Customer specific data 1. Used for customer
specific purposes. To get the usage of this field, please validate
with an FIS officer

UserData2.description:
Customer specific data 2. Used for customer
specific purposes. To get the usage of this field, please validate
with an FIS officer

UserData3.description:
Customer specific data 3. Used for customer
specific purposes. To get the usage of this field, please validate
with an FIS officer

UserData4.description:
Customer specific data 4. Used for customer
specific purposes. To get the usage of this field, please validate
with an FIS officer

UserData5.description:
Customer specific data 5. Used for customer
specific purposes. To get the usage of this field, please validate
with an FIS officer

CreditLimit.description: Single credit limit allowed for the application

EvaluationCode.description:
Evaluation code used to calculate this limit. Can
be used to do custom processing by limit from the calling channel

sch12_RequestedCurrencyListType.title: sch12_RequestedCurrencyListType
sch12_RequestedCurrencyListType.description: List of currencies requested for the application

Value.description: Value to be set for the flag

allOf.description: Value to be set for the flag

InstitutionCode.description: Institution code the account belongs to

AccountNumber.description:
Account number identifying an account under a
specific institution

allOf.description:
Reference to the Common Currency Identifier
Object holding the details of the account currency

AccountTypeCode.description:
Code identifying the account type of the account.
To get the list of supported values, please use the
GetAccountTypeList service

allOf.description:
Card class identifying the type of the account
(debit, credit or charge account)

AccountStatus.description:
Status of the account. To get the list of
supported value, use the GetAccountStatusList service

allOf.description:
Flag indicating if the account belongs to a VIP
customer or not

BlockedAmount.description:
Blocked amount on the account (authorized amount
that is not yet cleared and not yet debited from the account)

AvailableBalance.description:
Available Balance on the account. This is not the
value allowed to be spent by the account, the actual value allowed
to be spent is the available balance - the blocked amount

AvailableBalanceToSpend.description:
Available Balance that can be spent by the
account. This value is calculated by subtracting the blocked
amount from the available balance

CreditLimit.description: The credit limit of the account

UserData1.description:
Customer specific data 1. Used for customer
specific purposes

UserData2.description:
Customer specific data 2. Used for customer
specific purposes

UserData3.description:
Customer specific data 3. Used for customer
specific purposes

UserData4.description:
Customer specific data 4. Used for customer
specific purposes

UserData5.description:
Customer specific data 5. Used for customer
specific purposes

applId_ApplicationIdentifierType.title: applId_ApplicationIdentifierType

InstitutionCode.description: Institution Code the application belongs to

ApplicationNumber.description:
Unique application number under a specific
institution

ExternalApplicationNumber.description:
External Application number under a specific
institution. This is the application number generated by an
external system if any.

applId_ApplicationIdentifierType.description:
Identifier of an card application in Cortex. Only
one of the following combinations is enough
- Application number and
Institution Code
- External application number and Institution Code
If both application number and external application number are
specified, they are validated to make sure they are linked

CorporateCode.description:
Unique code identifying the corporate entity in
Cortex

EntityBusinessDescription.description: Description of the business of the entity

AlternativeEntityBusinessDescription.description:
Alternative description of the business of the
entity

RegistrationNumber.description: Registration number for the corporate entity

ContractStartDate.description:
Date the contract with the corporate entity
started

ContractEndDate.description: Date the contract with the corporate entity ends
